title: yhiaali3
author: yhiaali3
content: Is there anyone who has invested in this token:palmpay project 🌴 🌴The project aims to develop the digital market, where anyone can trade commodities of all kinds worldwide without the need to use banks, and payment is by PALM currency.The web site (https://palmpaycoin.com/)👉🏽 🌴The online store (https://palmpaystore.com/) 👉🏽 🌴The token is listed on  PancakeSwap 🌴💚 pancakeswap.financeAlso cointiger exchangehttps://www.cointiger.la/en-us/#/trade_pro?coin=palm_usdtPalm token will be listed on coinsbit tomorrow 3/5/2023It is prepared by the bitmart platform 👉The token topped the first place in trading for several consecutive daysTotal tokens: 21M onlyAvailable for circulation: 750 thousand pieces only, the rest is closed until next year. token Chart👉🏽  (https://poocoin.app/tokens/0xf85be0902a16fb87d447021d6e4517b38a15087d) 🌴Contract audit (https://twitter.com/interfinetwork/status/1559286325177491456?s=28)👉🏽 🌴Contract (https://bscscan.com/address/0xf85be0902a16fb87d447021d6e4517b38a15087d#code)👉🏽 🌴Telegram channel link (https://t.me/palmpaychat) 👉🏽 🌴Twitter👉🏽 https://twitter.com/PalmPayCoinThe price rose from 0.1$ to 5$ in a few days and now at the point 1.8$, I bought a number of tokens and waited for the rise.Disclaimer: Of course this is not investment advice, just general information, everyone should do their own research.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: One should stay away from this dubious shitcoin, which has such a graph.It's 20 times cheaper and trades on all sorts of low-liquid exchanges. If someone thinks it has fallen that much in price and it is a good opportunity to buy and then make money, they could be in for a big trap. Many of the tokens on this DEX have a similar graph. The token is, in fact, totally speculative and there is nothing good about it except for its owner and early investors. The rest of us will be left with this useless "funny money" and will wait for growth their whole lives.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: The main things they're offering.Other crypto can be used as the payment system, no need these token. I think you are have high rank in here, and know that this is kind of shittoken based on how they feature they're offering and how the price movement.So, I'm pretty sure you are sharing for sharing your bag and hoping to get a pump ~LOL.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on May 02, 2023, 06:56:19 PMOne should stay away from this dubious shitcoin, which has such a graph.It's 20 times cheaper and trades on all sorts of low-liquid exchanges. If someone thinks it has fallen that much in price and it is a good opportunity to buy and then make money, they could be in for a big trap. Many of the tokens on this DEX have a similar graph. The token is, in fact, totally speculative and there is nothing good about it except for its owner and early investors. The rest of us will be left with this useless "funny money" and will wait for growth their whole lives.I think there is a mistake, perhaps there is a similarity in the names between the two currencies, this is a picture of the token Chart that I am talking about:                   This is the CoinMarket link:https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/palmpay/Please look well. Because the picture you put is of another coin.Quote from: ryzaadit on May 02, 2023, 07:19:50 PMSo, I'm pretty sure you are sharing for sharing your bag and hoping to get a pump ~LOL.I did not ask you to buy and I do not ask anyone to do so. If anyone wants to buy, they are the only ones responsible for their decision.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on May 02, 2023, 08:27:34 PMI think there is a mistake, perhaps there is a similarity in the names between the two currencies, this is a picture of the token Chart that I am talking about:I get the impression that you don't check what you post yourself. I opened your linkQuote from: yhiaali3 on May 02, 2023, 04:25:52 PMThe token is listed on  PancakeSwap 🌴💚 pancakeswap.financeAnd I opened the 1 week chart of this token. It absolutely clearly shows that it was worth $8 on April 26, and now it's worth 62 cents. Are you checking the information you are providing?

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on May 03, 2023, 07:56:49 AMI get the impression that you don't check what you post yourself. I opened your linkQuote from: yhiaali3 on May 02, 2023, 04:25:52 PMThe token is listed on  PancakeSwap 🌴💚 pancakeswap.financeAnd I opened the 1 week chart of this token. It absolutely clearly shows that it was worth $8 on April 26, and now it's worth 62 cents. Are you checking the information you are providing?Thank you for your professionalism, you provided accurate information.But at the same time, I'm not wrong. I rechecked the link I put up and it was correct, Also Chart I put up was correct as well, so I figured there was a problem somewhere.After a bit of research, I found the problem with PancakeSwap's chart. I'll put two pictures to show the confusion that occurred between you and me:This is a weekly chart (PALM/USDT) showing the high of $4.24 on April 28th and the current price of $1.48.                                      While when you click on the two reciprocal arrows shown in the image, you get another weekly chart (USDT/PALM) but there is a difference as the highest price is $8.77 on April 26th and the price is now $0.6:                                      And here the problem occurred because the price is different, I do not know why, but there is a difference between the first and second charts, but these are Pancake Swap charts.Look at the clear difference between the two charts of the same coin on the same platform, and here the problem occurred between you and me because the price is different. I do not know why, but there is a difference between the first and second charts, but these are PancakeSwap charts.But for me, the first Chart is correct, because I have been following the Token for a long time, and I know that the highest price was about 5$ and the lowest price was about 0.1$.In the end, I would like to say thank you very much.If there is something wrong with my words, please correct me.my regards

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: I have came across some post about this project then but didn't give it attention since I wasn't a fan of altcoin, I was actually scared put my resource because what most of all these altcoin does is that, whenever is very close to bitcoin halving or even sensing bull trend they list their token in other to trap people inside and dump their token on investors. I have came across few threads and post across the forum so anyone investing in this project is liable for their lost.
